flawed_nl_solution:
There are 23 * 4 = <<23*4=92>>92 seats on this bus.
After the first stop, there are 16+15 - 3 = <<16+15-3=82>>82 people on the bus.
After the 2nd stop, there are 82+17 - 10 = <<82+17-10=89>>89 people on the bus.
So there are 92 - 89 = <<92-89=3>>3 empty seats on the bus after the 2nd stop.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 28, not 82. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
